data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 21425, Version Hash: df47d2bb54e0b94e583d8de5d76ed5b7bb63d267
data.actual_result: The mention-icon/message dissapears after a few seconds like if it was read
data.expected_result: The mention/message should stay visible on the left sidebar until you check it
data.short_description: Mentions in Guilds/DM dissapear in the desktop-client, when a text-overlay is active and opened in a tabbed-out/minimized game
data.steps_to_repro: - click into a channel/dm on the overlay- get a message/dm in that channel- tab out of (e.g. press windows key) or already be tabbed out of the game, but not tabbed into the channel
